name: Manon Dangelser
bio: Manon is passionate about regreening cities. She has over 10 yearsâ€™ experience working on sustainability and climate resilience for the built environment. Through Urban Biome, she wants to make change on the ground, one green spot at a time. She loves maps and strongly believes in their power to reveal patterns, guide action, and reconnect cities with nature. Via UB, she aims to bring together technology, on-the-ground insight, and local efforts to help nature find its place back in the city.
